title: Ginger waffles
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon unsalted butter, softened', '2 tablespoons black treacle', '4 tablespoons liquid egg substitute', '75g kamut flour', '50g wholemeal pastry flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '175ml boiling water or as needed']
